creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
inscription: UC: [The Thirty-sixth Wise One / The Elder of Firm Deliverance professed at the Fertile Town. / Diligently seeking the orthodox dharma with no respite; / serving the Buddha in all capacities with thorough trust and devotion. / Purity, solemn sanctity, and firmness of will / all emerge from the mind that clings to nothing.]
medium: Handscroll fragment, mounted as hanging scroll, ink and light color on paper
title: The Thirty-sixth Stage, from Zenzai Dōji’s Fifty-five Pilgrimages, also known as Zenzai Dōji emaki
